thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Uncle M
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Uncle M

author: Uncle M
title: Uncle M
text: Town Fair Tire is new to our area. (Dayville CT) Their prices and service have been outstanding. We have been saving a lot of money compared to where we used to go. There can be a short wait if they happen to have a rush going on. But it is well worth it. Calling ahead can usually help to avoid that. Their little waiting room is comfortable with a TV, reading material and free coffee. I am pleased to be able to write a positive review for the new member of our community. Kevin and the rest of the staff have quickly earned my families business.
